channel.title: Java on Hugo Future Imperfect Slim

item.title: Java Interface
item.description: ​ I am recently working on java for my summer internship. As a newbie in programming who used to write C++ and python, the term interface confuses me. ​ A formal explanation of interface is that it is actually a collection of methods and fields that the class permits objects of other classes to access. It sounds just like abstract classes in C++ and the required method are just virtual functions !
